message:
### Error updating database.  Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'nam' in 'field list'
### The error may exist in file [D:\chrome下载地址\SpringBootDemo-master\SpringBootDemo-master\springboot-dubbo\dubbo-provider\target\classes\mappers\userDao.xml]
### The error may involve defaultParameterMap
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: update student         set             nam = ?,             sex = ?         where id = ?
### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'nam' in 'field list'
; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'nam' in 'field list'
